PageTitle: display bgp link-state unicast routing-table statistics
FuncDef: The display bgp link-state unicast routing-table statistics command displays BGP-LS route statistics.
CLIs: display bgp link-state unicast routing-table [ peer { <ipv4-address> | <ipv6-address> } { received-routes | advertised-routes } ] [ type { node | link | ipv4-prefix | ipv6-prefix | te-policy | srv6-sid } ] statistics

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the address of the IPv6 peer to be displayed.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the address of the IPv6 peer to be displayed.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Displays BGP-LS routes received from the specified peer.
-

Displays BGP-LS routes advertised to the specified peer.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp link-state unicast routing-table statistics
Total Number of IPv4 Prefix Routes: 3
Total Number of IPv6 Prefix Routes: 4
Total Number of TE Policy Routes: 5
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp link-state unicast routing-table statistics command displays statistics about BGP Link-state routes in the BGP-LS unicast address family.
